segments.text: I notice the calm garden through the window, so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the woman's drying dishes with such care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet is running wild, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to ruin the cabinets if it keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in the puddle now, slipping hazard all around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is reaching so high for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It tilts a bit, and my heart skips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting patiently, like it's all a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sharing a secret moment, kind of sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the overflow is just sad, such a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them without breaking the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This ordinary kitchen hides so much potential trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light makes it all look deceptively peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR
